attributes.action: A vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: He was elected by his own party, not by the nation. He does not have a true mandate to govern this country. Please sign this petition. 100,000 signatures means Parliament has to take note,but we need to act fast!
attributes.background: This country does not need Boris Johnson as Prime Minister. A vote of no confidence by parliament will stop him from becoming PM and the eventual UK ruination this would entail.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
